Row.Text: Goryeo Civics
Hojok
All that we are is the result of what we have thought
Dhammapada 1.1
Increased Gold from Towns. Decreased Happiness from Towns. Unlocks Manwoldae Palace Wonder.
Unlocks Seoktap Unique Building. Increased Settlement Limit.
Patriotic War
Be a lamp unto yourself. Work out your liberation with diligence.
Mahaparinibbana Sutta
Unlock Janggyeongjeon Unique Building and 'Cheollijangseong' Tradition.
Unlocks the ability to found a Religion. Unlocks a free additional Belief 'Tripitaka Koreana' to your Religion.
Cheollijangseong
Gain Influence from Walled Districts. Gain a free Support from Combats on your territory.
Tripitaka Koreana
Every Janggyeongjeon gains one more Great Work Slot. Cities with Janggyeongjeon can build a project to gain Relics called 'Daejanggyeongpan'.
Byeokrando
Just as a mother would protect her only child with her life, even so, let one cultivate a boundless love towards all beings
Karaniya Metta Sutta
Increased Gold on Improvements on Costal Marine and Navigable River. Unlocks 'Goryeo Cheongja' Tradition.
International Trade Routes from Goryeo gain additional Gold for its length.
Goryeo Cheongja
International Trade Routes gain Gold for every Warehouse in the Origin Settlement.
